name: Sponge Cake
ingredients: 1 Teaspoon Vanilla Paste/Flavouring of Your Choice (optional)

recipe.1a: Pre-heat the oven to 180 degrees celcius (no fan)
recipe.1b: Line the baking tin with baking paper and spread some melted butter onto it
recipe.1c: Prepare the butter and caster sugar for beating in a large mixing bowl
recipe.1d: Mix the dry (Plain Flower, Baking Powder and Salt) ingredients together in a second bowl
recipe.1e: Measure out the remaining ingredients (Vanilla Paste, 2 Eggs and Milk)
recipe.2: Beat the butter and caster sugar together until light and fluffy
recipe.3: Add the Vanilla Paste to the beaten butter
recipe.4: Add the 2 Eggs 1 by 1 to the beaten butter being careful to keep it light and airy
recipe.5: Slowly add in the mixed dry ingredients and milk bit by bit until all the ingredients are mixed together
recipe.6: Place the mixture into the baking tin
recipe.7: Bake in the oven for 45 minutes. Test if fully cooked by stabbing it with a knife, if it is then the knife will not have any batter on it
recipe.8: Once cooked through to the middle, take out of the oven, remove the baking tin and let the cake cool for 10-15 minutes
